Class Inventory

java.lang.Object
Inventory
public class Inventory
extends java.lang.Object
Inventory is the class that runs the show, it has all the methods that will be called in the main class of the program and it's in this class that the inventory will be modified/Updated..etc this class has the foodItem array set to default.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors 
    Constructor Description
    Inventory()
    Constructor default array set to 20 nothing over 20

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    boolean addItem​(java.util.Scanner scan, boolean fromFile)
    this method adds an item buy scanning data from the user.
    int alreadyExists​(InventoryItem item)
    this Method will first count the null values in the array and count what's actually valid in the array.
    void displayItemExpiryDates​(java.util.Scanner scan)
    this method is the intermediate method from the wrapper to the main method this method simply checks if the Item code is valid
    void removeExpiredItems()
    removeExpiredItems calls the InventoryItem class RemoveExpiredItems
    int searchForItem​(java.util.Scanner scan)
    this method searches through the index to find an item.
    java.util.Date setDate()  
    java.lang.String toString()
    this just builds the strings of the inventory using the string builder class.
    boolean updateQuantity​(java.util.Scanner scan, java.lang.Boolean buyOrSell)
    uodate Quantity method takes in a Scanner and A Boolean if the Boolean is true the program will add items to the given inventory code Otherwise the boolean is false, and the program will send scan a positive integer and pass the negative of that integer in the updateItem Method in the FootItem class.

    • alreadyExists

      public int alreadyExists​(InventoryItem item)
      this Method will first count the null values in the array and count what's actually valid in the array. I use this count as my iteration to avoid Array Out of Bounds index. ]
      Parameters:
      item -
      Returns:
      Integer Either the index or -1 to signify that it doesn't exist.

    • updateQuantity

      public boolean updateQuantity​(java.util.Scanner scan, java.lang.Boolean buyOrSell)
      uodate Quantity method takes in a Scanner and A Boolean if the Boolean is true the program will add items to the given inventory code Otherwise the boolean is false, and the program will send scan a positive integer and pass the negative of that integer in the updateItem Method in the FootItem class.
      Parameters:
      scan -
      buyOrSell -
      Returns:
      true
